content.rendered:
[gravityform id=”1″ name=”Apply Online” title=”false” description=”false”]
  Bridge Career offers many exceptional career opportunities in the fields of medical, administrative, accounting, engineering, IT, banking, as well as many others. We have a passion for matching great candidates with quality employers. At Bridge Career our main focus is full-time permanent placement. However, we also have opportunities for part-time and PRN/ECB (as needed) employment. We work with top-notch employers in Northeast Oklahoma who are searching for qualified employees that fit not only the job description but also the company culture. It is hard these days to know who is hiring and if they are a reputable company. Bridge Career has established connections with many growing and trusted employers across many different employment fields in the Tulsa area. Often, the companies we work with will not seek to advertise their open positions in other avenues. We will be the only resource they utilize to fill their need for a quality employee, so you will not see the opening listed in the newspaper or online. We would love to be your resource for finding a new position. Bridge Career will partner with you to enhance your job search and increase your visibility to Tulsa area employers. It is easy to apply with us today:
  • Take a few minutes to view our openings! We are always hiring experienced, quality professionals who are looking for a new opportunity.
  • Get started now and apply for one of the great jobs listed. Once you find a job, or jobs you are interested in, simply click the “Apply Now” link. There is no hassle and no creating a user account. Simply give us a few details and upload your resume. (Please make sure the contact information listed on your resume is current.) We prefer Word formatted resumes such as .doc or .txt.
  • If you are a qualified candidate, we will be in touch to schedule for an interview. We want to ensure all candidates are matched with the job that is the best fit the employer’s culture and skill set. If you have any concerns about your application, please contact us.
Please bookmark Bridge Careers Travel Agencies to your internet browser and continue to check back for open positions and the latest Bridge Career happenings and news. You can also connect with us on Facebook or LinkedIn.
